amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to enforce the Davis-Bacon Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to enforce the Davis-Bacon Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Amash amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 232 (Roll no. 414).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Amash.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Amash amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 232 (Roll no. 414).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
